original_text: Do not punish me as God is punishing me. You have already caused me to suffer enough. Do not punish me as God is punishing me. You have already caused me to suffer enough. Do not punish me as God is punishing me.
korean_text: 너희가 어찌하여 하나님처럼 나를 박해하느냐 내 살로도 부족하냐

sentences.original_text: You have already caused me to suffer enough
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이미 내가 충분히 고통받게 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: You have already caused me to suffer enough
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이미 내가 충분히 고통받게 만들었습니다
